mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Trade (id, registrant_id, acc_id, target_acc_id, branch_id, trade_date, amount, balance, trade_type, status, cash_indicator, description, trade_number, registration_date) VALUES (#{id}, #{registrantId}, #{accId}, #{targetAccId}, #{branchId}, #{tradeDate}, #{amount}, #{balance}, #{tradeType}, #{status}, #{cashIndicator}, #{description}, #{tradeNumber}, #{registrationDate});
